com.example.easycooking.view

Class ModifyImageActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.easycooking.view.ModifyImageActivity

  • public class ModifyImageActivity
extends Activity
    The main goal of this activity is to take photos and display them In this page, user have choice of taking photo and saving photo if user wants to take photo, activity will jump the the camera App which is build in android system After taking photo, user have the choice to save, retake and cancel. If user choose ok, image will be saved, retake to re-activate camera, cancel to cancel and go back to App. Also, in the this page, the most recent image will be displayed on a image button.
    Author:
    HongZu
